title: The Halloween Party
description: In this Dateline classic, detectives settle in for a long investigation while a Michigan town searches for clues when one of their residents goes missing from a Halloween party. Keith Morrison reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 27, 2017.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
